name: Kinetic collage/ portrait in motion
description:
Information anxiety. Information Experience. Information design. Information graphics. Complexity as information. Seeing is believing says the adage. But you must see clearly.
All of this due to the power of the image, its perceptual immediacy: it conveys more information rapidly- colour, size, position- in a small time and appealing to our visual comprehension, the one we have most developed; we are not so good at smell and audition as other species. This is the attention cost. There is a limit to what we can apprehend from the image ( it is our limitation, not the image's). At a certain point of complexity, an image can be digested trough levels of visual understanding and segmentation. A composition about the mediatic man, inspired by the dictum "The media is the message" that sparked the development of media theory in the second half of the 20th century, spearheaded by Marshall McLuhan and his writings on media and how technical developments influence the way we see the world, from the printing press to the television and radio. file type: mp4/mkv, author: gefercan, year of creation: 2022, lenght: 30 sec, aprox. size: 1080 x 1080 aprox.
